titles.title: A bill regarding permitted public uses within the DeSoto National Wildlife Refuge, Iowa.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Referred to Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment.

committee.subcommittee: Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment
committee.name: House Merchant Marine and Fisheries

bill.summary: 7/1/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to permit power boating and water skiing during the summer months in the eastern half of the lake in the DeSoto National Wildlife Refuge, Iowa, with specified restrictions.
